text.0: forth through the strainingcloth the sage flows to the banquet of the gods.
text.2: for he as pavamana sends thousandfold treasure in the shape.
text.4: thou graspest all things with thy mind and purifiest thee with thoughts.
text.5: as such o soma find us fame.
text.6: pour lofty glory on us send sure riches to our liberal lords.
text.7: bring food to those who sing thy praise.
text.8: as thou art cleansed o wondrous steed o soma thou hast entered like.
text.9: a pious king into the songs.
text.10: he soma like a courser in the floods invincible made clean.
text.11: with hands is resting in the jars.
text.12: disporting like a liberal chief thou goest soma to the sieve.
text.13: lending the laud a heros strength.
